languages.text: "Признайся: Механикус просто не хотят делиться тайнами, так как боятся, что кто-то их превзойдет".

traits.locale_text: "Признайся: вы просто не хотите делиться со всеми игрушками".

languages.text: "Admit it, the Adeptus Mechanicus do not wish to share their secrets because they are afraid that someone might surpass them. It is as simple as that."
languages.original_text: "Признайся: Механикус просто не хотят делиться тайнами, так как боятся, что кто-то их превзойдет".

traits.locale_text: "Admit it, the Adeptus Mechanicus do not wish to share their secrets because they are afraid that someone might surpass them. It is as simple as that."
"Admit it, you just do not feel like sharing your toys."
"Admit it, the Adeptus Mechanicus do not wish to share their secrets because they are afraid that someone might surpass them. It is as simple as that."
"Admit it, the Adeptus Mechanicus do not wish to share their secrets because they are afraid that someone might surpass them. It is as simple as that."
"Admit it, the Adeptus Mechanicus do not wish to share their secrets because they are afraid that someone might surpass them. It is as simple as that."
"Admit it, the Adeptus Mechanicus do not wish to share their secrets because they are afraid that someone might surpass them. It is as simple as that."

languages.text: "Gebt es zu, der Adeptus Mechanicus möchte nicht, dass ihr seine Geheimnisse weitergebt, weil er Angst hat, dass jemand ihn übertreffen könnte. So einfach ist das."
languages.original_text: "Admit it, the Adeptus Mechanicus do not wish to share their secrets because they are afraid that someone might surpass them. It is as simple as that."

traits.locale_text: "Gebt es zu, der Adeptus Mechanicus möchte nicht, dass ihr seine Geheimnisse weitergebt, weil er Angst hat, dass jemand ihn übertreffen könnte. So einfach ist das."

languages.text: « Admettez-le : l'Adeptus Mechanicus ne veut pas partager ses secrets par crainte que quelqu'un ne le surpasse. C'est aussi simple que cela. »
languages.original_text: "Admit it, the Adeptus Mechanicus do not wish to share their secrets because they are afraid that someone might surpass them. It is as simple as that."

traits.locale_text: « Admettez-le : l'Adeptus Mechanicus ne veut pas partager ses secrets par crainte que quelqu'un ne le surpasse. C'est aussi simple que cela. »

languages.text: “你就承认了吧，机械修会根本不想分享他们的秘密，因为他们害怕有人超过他们。事情就是这么简单。”
languages.original_text: "Admit it, the Adeptus Mechanicus do not wish to share their secrets because they are afraid that someone might surpass them. It is as simple as that."

traits.locale_text: “你就承认了吧，机械修会根本不想分享他们的秘密，因为他们害怕有人超过他们。事情就是这么简单。”

languages.text: 「認めよう、帝国技術局は誰かが自分たちを追い越すことを恐れているため、その秘密を共有しようとしない。ただそれだけのことだ」
languages.original_text: "Admit it, the Adeptus Mechanicus do not wish to share their secrets because they are afraid that someone might surpass them. It is as simple as that."

traits.locale_text: 「認めよう、帝国技術局は誰かが自分たちを追い越すことを恐れているため、その秘密を共有しようとしない。ただそれだけのことだ」

languages.text: «Admítalo: el Adeptus Mechanicus no quiere compartir sus secretos porque teme que alguien lo sobrepase. Es tan sencillo como eso».
languages.original_text: "Admit it, the Adeptus Mechanicus do not wish to share their secrets because they are afraid that someone might surpass them. It is as simple as that."

traits.locale_text: «Admítalo: el Adeptus Mechanicus no quiere compartir sus secretos porque teme que alguien lo sobrepase. Es tan sencillo como eso».

languages.text: "Kabul et... Adeptus Mechanicus'un sırlarını paylaşmayı istememe sebebi, başkalarının onları geçebileceğinden korkması. Bu kadar basit."
languages.original_text: "Admit it, the Adeptus Mechanicus do not wish to share their secrets because they are afraid that someone might surpass them. It is as simple as that."

traits.locale_text: "Kabul et, Adeptus Mechanicus'un sırlarını paylaşmayı istememe sebebi, başkalarının onları geçebileceğinden korkması. Bu kadar basit."
